caption.center: George Damon, Respondent, v. George Doheny, Appellant, Impleaded with

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Judgment and order reversed and new trial ordered, with costs to the appellant to abide event, unless the plaintiff stipulates to reduce the verdict to the sum of $2,500 as of the date of the rendition thereof, in which event the judgment as so modified and the order are affirmed, without costs of this appeal to either party. All concurred, except Hiscock, J., not voting.
